details:
This package runs commands in a pre-install script that exfils sensitive data to a attacker-controlled domain.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fc21e3384d0921c988c3a9357b6d7568003a57b5ce8492d7c2568bcd5ccfe2c9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'spectro-cloud-docs' @ 4.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
